channel.title: Using Dialplan Functions on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Using Dialplan Functions on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Using Dialplan Functions: AES_DECRYPT() and AES_ENCRYPT()
item.description: I recently asked on twitter how many people would be interested in a set of blog posts that focused on how to use the various dialplan functions in Asterisk, and I got quite a positive response. I posted that shortly before getting married, and now that I’m back into the groove of things, I’m going to take a shot at posting a bunch of content focused around Asterisk dialplan functions. If you don’t know what Asterisk dialplan functions are, head on over to the online version of Asterisk: The Definitive Guide (3rd edition) (or buy it) and read the section on dialplan functions.
